code: import{FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER,FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_CONVERSATION,FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_CONVERSATION_SUCCESS,FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_SUCCESS,FILTER_CONTACT,FILTER_USERS,ON_HIDE_LOADER,ON_SELECT_USER,ON_TOGGLE_DRAWER,SHOW_MESSAGE,SUBMIT_COMMENT,UPDATE_MESSAGE_VALUE,UPDATE_SEARCH_CHAT_USER,USER_INFO_STATE}from'constants/ActionTypes';export var fetchChatUser=function fetchChatUser(){return{type:FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER};};export var fetchChatUserConversation=function fetchChatUserConversation(){return{type:FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_CONVERSATION};};export var fetchChatUserSuccess=function fetchChatUserSuccess(mails){return{type:FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_SUCCESS,payload:mails};};export var fetchChatUserConversationSuccess=function fetchChatUserConversationSuccess(mails){return{type:FETCH_ALL_CHAT_USER_CONVERSATION_SUCCESS,payload:mails};};export var showChatMessage=function showChatMessage(message){return{type:SHOW_MESSAGE,payload:message};};export var filterContacts=function filterContacts(userName){return{type:FILTER_CONTACT,payload:userName};};export var filterUsers=function filterUsers(userName){return{type:FILTER_USERS,payload:userName};};export var onSelectUser=function onSelectUser(user){return{type:ON_SELECT_USER,payload:user};};export var submitComment=function submitComment(){return{type:SUBMIT_COMMENT};};export var hideLoader=function hideLoader(){return{type:ON_HIDE_LOADER};};export var userInfoState=function userInfoState(state){return{type:USER_INFO_STATE,payload:state};};export var updateMessageValue=function updateMessageValue(message){return{type:UPDATE_MESSAGE_VALUE,payload:message};};export var updateSearchChatUser=function updateSearchChatUser(userName){return{type:UPDATE_SEARCH_CHAT_USER,payload:userName};};export var onChatToggleDrawer=function onChatToggleDrawer(){return{type:ON_TOGGLE_DRAWER};};
